name: Orc
description: Orcs are fierce, green-skinned humanoids known for their savage nature and warlike culture. They stand taller and stronger than most humans, often wielding crude but effective weapons like axes, spears, or clubs.
memorable: Orcs thrive in melee combat, charging into battle with little regard for safety, often leading raids and attacks.
goals: To conquer and take what they want by force.
relations: Often led by chieftains or powerful shamans, they may be encountered alongside other orc tribes.
environment: Commonly found in warbands raiding settlements.
strengths: Strong and resilient warriors with decent hit points and an ability to resist debilitating effects.
weaknesses: Lack of intelligence and charm, making them vulnerable to more cunning adversaries.
attacks: Uses a greataxe and javelins for melee and ranged attacks, dealing significant slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aggressive ability allows them to close distance toward foes rapidly.
senses: Has darkvision allowing better vision in low light conditions.
skills: Notable for intimidation with a proficiency that enhances their frightening presence.
additional_information: Stalwart ability grants advantage on saving throws against ongoing effects.
Charge into battle with little regard for safety.
Often form raiding parties to attack settlements.
